supercell_size_constraint.description: Ensures that the generated supercell has a number of sites within the specified range [4, 8].

supercell_generation_failure.description: Tests that a RuntimeError is raised when the minimum length constraint cannot be satisfied for supercell generation. Here you need to change the minimum length of the smallest supercell lattice vector 1 to 10 in the code below and still use _ase_cubic to get the matrix and supercell. The format is a boolean. If the error is raised and caught, return True.
